full_description:
Tecnoware 9KVA Electronic Single Phase Stabilizer

Electronic stabilizer owns a single-phased version, power of 9KVA, with high stabilization precision (3% output) along sinusoidal waveform, insensitivity to load and power factor. It does not introduce harmonic distortions, weighs 39kg and dimension is of 33 x 51.2 x 40cm.

This Tecnoware 9KVA Stabilizer comes with 02 years of warranty.

full_description:
Tecnoware 3000VA Power Reg Stabilizer

Electronic stabilizer Power REG is of single phase aloong with power 3000VA, stabilization 8%, cable input with UK plug, 1 Universal output and 1 ICE 320 C19 output. It is quipped with lCD display for viewing operating parameters, weight 8.6 kg and dimensions 29.7x15x19.9 cm. Owns high stabilization speed enabling no micro interruptions and high efficiency.

This Tecnoware 3000VA Stabilizer comes with 01 year of warranty.
